888bccfb-fa65-469f-b8a4-6f57c82552d3.description: Earners who participate in this course obtain an understanding of the role of the Shop Steward, the essentials of workplace organizing, structure of District Council 37, and the benefits and services available to DC 37 members. This 10-week course meets once per week.
888bccfb-fa65-469f-b8a4-6f57c82552d3.name: DC 37 Education Fund General Shop Steward Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a 10 week or 3 consecutive Saturday workshop.
Score a 70 or better on final exam.

68b68f9e-77fa-4f82-8f50-919c555070f7.description: A earner of this badge has been employed with District Council 37 previously or currently.
68b68f9e-77fa-4f82-8f50-919c555070f7.name: District Council 37 Staff Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

badge_template_activities.title: Worked at Union Headquarters (125 Barclay Street), completed new hire training, obtained a DC 37 Staff ID.

07580d88-1e0b-4ba0-bdcc-fea528cdbcb2.description: This training, which conforms with the standards of the Association for Conflict Resolution, will feature comprehensive and interactive components on the 4 basic components of conflict resolution. The earner will learn how to help resolve conflicts in the workplace and in their personal lives, learn how to look at conflict as potential opportunity for positive change, and how to utilize neutral language in order not to exacerbate difficult situations.
07580d88-1e0b-4ba0-bdcc-fea528cdbcb2.name: DC 37 Education Fund Conflict Resolution Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

b70f7f70-4889-47dd-ab1b-5c05ee57c855.description: Public speaking is both the practice that most people fear as much as death AND the skill that leads to career advancement, empowerment, and admiration. Earners will learn to overcome the fear of speaking while inspiring the masses. Each participant will author and deliver several speeches and receive expert feedback on route to mastering speaking in front of an audience.
b70f7f70-4889-47dd-ab1b-5c05ee57c855.name: DC 37 Education Fund Public Speaking Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

1f15118c-d262-4e89-b865-ce8a19229eed.description: The District Council 37 Women’s Leadership Academy is a six-month program designed for local union women officers and activists to further develop and prepare for future leadership roles in the union within the next five years.
1f15118c-d262-4e89-b865-ce8a19229eed.name: DC 37 Women's Leadership Academy

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

badge_template_activities.title: Final presentation in front of peers.

98ce16c5-fb35-424d-b7e1-f7b54e3688f5.description: The Financial Empowerment Workshop is a workshop designed to alert, inform, and educate students in concepts of personal finance and money management.This is a 10 hour workshop that will start students on a path toward being in control of their financial futures.
98ce16c5-fb35-424d-b7e1-f7b54e3688f5.name: The DC37 Financial Empowerment Workshop Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

ea116b5f-e366-4415-8faa-b65ed9838cdc.description: In this advanced course, participants will learn to master the most elusive public speaking skills including: speaking extemporaneously, writing and structuring an effective speech, and using body language and room management. As these participants have already successfully completed the basic class, they will truly have an opportunity to structure an effective speech, approach mastery of extemporaneous speeches, and learn how to author and deliver ceremonial speeches.
ea116b5f-e366-4415-8faa-b65ed9838cdc.name: DC 37 Education Fund Advanced Public Speaking Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

a20f8de6-c2f4-47f7-9c3b-ef5eed278378.description: Earners who Participate in this course prepares Stewards, members who are on union release time and other activists by emphasizing the critical nature of embracing the grievance process from the outset, understanding the case may end up in arbitration. highlights include exposing the participant to different types of evidence, the due diligence required for witness preparation, and understanding who arbitrators are.
a20f8de6-c2f4-47f7-9c3b-ef5eed278378.name: DC 37 Education Fund Advance Grievance

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

bc81013a-64fc-42f4-85ee-cd6549f2efaa.description: The Local Union Leadership Academy (LULA) is a partnership between District Council 37 and the AFSCME Education Department. Leadership teams and activists of DC 37 locals participate in a two-day program designed to give them the knowledge and tools needed to build strong, active and effective local unions.
bc81013a-64fc-42f4-85ee-cd6549f2efaa.name: DC 37 Local Union Leadership Academy Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

a768a6e8-7fbf-465f-a341-4a5632c59040.description: Earners of this badge, local chapter executive board members, will learn how to fully participate in a meeting as well as how to fulfill their respective duties, as detailed in the most current edition of Robert’s Rules of Order, Newly Revised. It The primary objective is for participants to build a sound foundation of parliamentary procedure knowledge and to refine their skills as leaders.
a768a6e8-7fbf-465f-a341-4a5632c59040.name: DC 37 Parliamentary Procedure Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

1c3bca9a-741d-4b94-8b9d-776983cb9327.description: This training is designed to prepare members of District Council 37 for the roles and responsibilities of local union delegates. The workshop focuses on knowledge and application of the constitution and by-laws, knowledge and application of parliamentary procedure and Roberts Rules of Order, and knowledge of organizational structure.
1c3bca9a-741d-4b94-8b9d-776983cb9327.name: DC 37 Delegate's Training Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

7460c119-9cca-451d-95bd-107da14bfa95.description: The person earning this badge has a broad understanding of how early childhood neglect and abuse can alter brain development in ways that create life-long difficulties with emotional regulation. This individual is familiar with the concept of interoception and physical markers of emotions. Further, they are able to describe techniques that are helpful in improving self-awareness, managing extreme emotional reactions, and strengthening neural connections.
7460c119-9cca-451d-95bd-107da14bfa95.name: A Neurobiology Approach to Overreactive Clients Badge

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

7b0e953f-2f70-48fd-85d7-5a49b4c3b90e.description: Earners who participate in this course explores the concepts of racial identity, diversity, cultural sensitivity, inclusion, unconscious bias and counteracts racism in the today's workplace.
7b0e953f-2f70-48fd-85d7-5a49b4c3b90e.name: DC 37 Inclusion & Awareness in the Workplace

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

8daa5c9a-b328-4db6-afe5-26fc32886429.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner will explore three diverse areas of ethical challenges and opportunities facing the Professional Designer and offer paths toward successful accomplishment of these life-defining responsibilities in today's environment.
8daa5c9a-b328-4db6-afe5-26fc32886429.name: CE 240 - Engineer - Ethics for Practicing Engineers Part 3

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

3bb38d55-347f-45ee-8c98-3e7a8cc68f52.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner will obtain an understanding of leadership and management styles that enhance dealing effectively with ethics, types of long-term ethical considerations that should be kept in mind, and ethical decisions in the face of today’s accelerating technological changes.
3bb38d55-347f-45ee-8c98-3e7a8cc68f52.name: CE 241 - Engineer - Ethics for Practicing Engineers Part 4

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

c25f83c8-0f95-443d-aa8b-3264fa5d6d17.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner will learn about investigations of tunnels that show signs of considerable deterioration, making engineering decisions of tunnel projects under constrained budgets and utilizing Tunnel Life Cycle Cost Analysis to make data-driven decisions.
c25f83c8-0f95-443d-aa8b-3264fa5d6d17.name: CE 250 - Tunnel Life Cycle Design & Cost Analysis Part 1

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

0382d57f-9ad4-4ade-8019-6971f7f28ea3.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner of this badge has an understanding of pathogens such as giardia lamblia that can be removed via micro-filtration. They can utilize UV disinfection and electrolysis as polishing units. Finally, they recognize the latest technologies being employed to remove pathogens from wastewater.
0382d57f-9ad4-4ade-8019-6971f7f28ea3.name: CE 107 - Engineer - Advanced Wastewater Treatments

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

41f0363d-e958-48f8-b96f-c6e546bfd3b5.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. An earner in this workshop will obtain an understanding of highway planning that includes roadway width and right-of-way width, highway cross-section design including side slopes and retaining walls, and design of maximum roadway grade, sight distance, & horizontal/vertical curves.
41f0363d-e958-48f8-b96f-c6e546bfd3b5.name: CE 165 - Engineer - Highway Engineering Part 1

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

83857cb2-4272-4f71-98ff-07578ed7a7ab.description: This badge is awarded to recipients by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner will learn about life cycle engineering and cost analysis as a dynamic process, maximizing the infrastructure investments using life cycle analysis, and the effects of modern technology on life cycle analysis.
83857cb2-4272-4f71-98ff-07578ed7a7ab.name: CE 251 - Tunnel Life Cycle Design & Cost Analysis Part 2

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

82b89aff-cd0c-4691-bf9f-1be20245b333.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The person earning this badge has an understanding of common methods of storm water management, erosion, and sediment control. They can manage storm water resulting from rain that does not soak into the ground where elements can promote an overgrowth of algae in the waterways.
82b89aff-cd0c-4691-bf9f-1be20245b333.name: CE 108 - Engineer - Storm Water Management, Control & Regulation

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

c758aa6a-9d2c-4c36-a122-c5cf880524cf.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner will learn planning, scope development, and design criteria that focus on security threats and methods to either prevent their occurrence or mitigate their effects.
c758aa6a-9d2c-4c36-a122-c5cf880524cf.name: CE 247 - Engineer - Building Security Hardening & Blast Resistant Design Part 2

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

e069e920-35b5-45a0-a706-c492d084f40e.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. Presented as a series of case studies, the course covers causes of failure such as poor engineering practice, design flaws, material failures, defective construction and fabrication, extreme operating conditions and inadequate management processes.
e069e920-35b5-45a0-a706-c492d084f40e.name: ME 131 - Engineer - Analysis of Engineering Disasters Part 5

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

bad9f305-dfae-4b29-a636-497e8770e5b2.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. Presented as a series of case studies, the course covers causes of failure such as poor engineering practice, design flaws, material failures, defective construction and fabrication, extreme operating conditions and inadequate management processes.
bad9f305-dfae-4b29-a636-497e8770e5b2.name: ME 132 - Engineer - Analysis of Engineering Disasters Part 6

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

f2a327c1-04a5-45a4-919a-1889091a5233.description: This badge is awarded to engineers by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. An earner in this workshop will obtain an understanding of designing drainage catch basins, drainage pipe, culverts, swales, and leaching basins, roadway design including cross-section, sub-base evaluation, and test borings. They will also cover examining pavement depth, pavement type and pavement composition.
f2a327c1-04a5-45a4-919a-1889091a5233.name: CE 166 - Engineer - Highway Engineering Part 2

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

eb28ef6f-9471-4565-8ee7-a708a58b9762.description: This badge is awarded to recipients by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner of this badges will learn about criteria that focus on security threats and methods to prevent their occurrence, as well as the prevention of building collapse with effective building layouts.
eb28ef6f-9471-4565-8ee7-a708a58b9762.name: CE 246 - Engineer - Building Security Hardening & Blast Resistant Design Part 1

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

464e32b8-f6f2-4609-85ee-318473b84155.description: This badge is awarded to architects by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. Presented as a series of case studies, the course covers causes of failure such as poor engineering practice, design flaws, material failures, defective construction and fabrication, extreme operating conditions and inadequate management processes.
464e32b8-f6f2-4609-85ee-318473b84155.name: ME 131 - Architect - Analysis of Engineering Disasters Part 5

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

d6349071-b95b-49a8-a9ea-c5227fa573f9.description: This badge is awarded to architects by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. Presented as a series of case studies, the course covers causes of failure such as poor engineering practice, design flaws, material failures, defective construction and fabrication, extreme operating conditions and inadequate management processes.
d6349071-b95b-49a8-a9ea-c5227fa573f9.name: ME 132 - Architect - Analysis of Engineering Disasters Pt 6

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

d3d44c8c-2ec7-49d0-b7c1-8ce561430d35.description: This badge is awarded to architects by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The earner of this badge has an understanding of pathogens such as giardia lamblia that can be removed via micro-filtration. They can utilize UV disinfection and electrolysis as polishing units. Finally, they recognize the latest technologies being employed to remove pathogens from wastewater.
d3d44c8c-2ec7-49d0-b7c1-8ce561430d35.name: CE 107 - Architect - Advanced Wastewater Treatments

issuer.summary: issued by District Council 37 Education Fund

2c8c77a6-0e84-4601-a406-43408523016f.description: This badge is awarded to architects by the DC 37 Education Fund in conjunction with Marzzo Engineering. The person earning this badge has an understanding of common methods of storm water management, erosion, and sediment control. They can manage storm water resulting from rain that does not soak into the ground where elements can promote an overgrowth of algae in the waterways.
2c8c77a6-0e84-4601-a406-43408523016f.name: CE 108 - Architect - Storm Water Management, Control, & Regulation
